trans-unit.source: Will appear on main page. Recommended size for the default theme: height %height% and width %width%.
trans-unit.target: Bo prikazano na glavni strani. Priporočena velikost privzete teme: višina %height% in širina %width%.

trans-unit.source: Will appear on email headers. If undefined, the header logo will be used.
trans-unit.target: Se bo pojavljal v glavi e-poštnih sporočil. Če ni nastavljen bo uporabljen "Logo za glavo".

trans-unit.source: Warning: if no invoice logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: POZOR: če ni na voljo mail logotipa, bo uporabljen privzeti.

trans-unit.source: Will appear on invoice headers.
trans-unit.target: Bo prikazano v glavi računa.

trans-unit.source: Warning: you can use a PNG file for transparency, but it can take up to 1 second per page for processing. Please consider using JPG instead.
trans-unit.target: POZOR: za transparentnost lahko uporabite PNG, vendar bo trajalo sekundo na stran za procesiranje. Razmislite o uporabi JPG.

trans-unit.source: Will appear in the address bar of your web browser.
trans-unit.target: Se bo pojavila v naslovni vrstici vašega brskalnika.

trans-unit.source: Be careful! Please check your theme in an RTL language before generating the RTL stylesheet: your theme could be already adapted to RTL.\nOnce you click on "Adapt to RTL", any RTL-specific file that you might have added to your theme might be deleted by the created stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: Bodi previden! Prosimo, preverite svojo temo v jeziku RTL, preden ustvarite slogovno oznako RTL: vaša tema je lahko že prilagojena RTL-ju. \n Ko kliknete "Adapt to RTL", se lahko izbriše katera koli datoteka, specifična za RTL, ki ste jo morda dodali v vašo temo ustvarjene slogovne tabele.

trans-unit.source: You must select a shop from the above list if you wish to choose a theme.
trans-unit.target: Izbrati morate skupino iz zgornjega seznama, če želite izbrati temo.

trans-unit.source: Browse your computer files and select the Zip file for your new theme.
trans-unit.target: Prebrskajte računalnik in izberite zip datoteko vaše predloge.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the complete URL to an online Zip file that contains your new theme. For instance, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".
trans-unit.target: Ponazarja celoten URL zip datoteke na spletu, ki vsebuje vašo novo predlogo. Na primer, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".

trans-unit.source: This selector lists the Zip files that you uploaded in the '/themes' folder.
trans-unit.target: Ta izbirnik prikaže seznam Zip datotek, ki ste jih prenesli v '/themes' fmapo.

trans-unit.source: To add "tags" click in the field, write something, and then press "Enter."
trans-unit.target: Za dodajanje "oznak" kliknite na polje, nekaj napišite in nato pritisnite "Enter" ali vpišite vejico.

trans-unit.source: JPEG images have a small file size and standard quality. PNG images have a larger file size, a higher quality and support transparency. Note that in all cases the image files will have the .jpg extension.
trans-unit.target: JPEG slike imajo majhno velikost datoteke in standardne kakovosti. PNG slike so večje velikosti datoteke, imajo višjo kakovost in podporo preglednosti. Upoštevajte, da bo v vseh primerih slikovne datoteke so. Jpg podaljšek.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: This feature may not be compatible with your theme, or with some of your modules. In particular, PNG mode is not compatible with the Watermark module. If you encounter any issues, turn it off by selecting "Use JPEG".
trans-unit.target: POZOR: Ta funkcionalnost ni združljiva z vašo temo ali z nekaterimi vašimi moduli. Zlasti PNGji niso združljivi z modulom Watermark. Če naletite na kakšne težave, jih izklopite z izbiro "Uporabi JPEG".

trans-unit.source: Ranges from 0 (worst quality, smallest file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file).
trans-unit.target: od 0 (najslabše, najmanjša velikost) do 100 (najboljša kvaliteta, največja velikost)

trans-unit.source: Recommended: 90.
trans-unit.target: Priporočeno: 90.

trans-unit.source: PNG compression is lossless: unlike JPG, you do not lose image quality with a high compression ratio. However, photographs will compress very badly.
trans-unit.target: PNG kompresija ima izgube: pri JPG, ne izgubite kvalitete slike z veliko kompresijo. Vedar bodo slike zelo slabo stisnjene.

trans-unit.source: Ranges from 0 (biggest file) to 9 (smallest file, slowest decompression).
trans-unit.target: Sega od 0 (velika datoteka) do 9 (manše datoteke, počasnejše raztegovanje).

trans-unit.source: Recommended: 7.
trans-unit.target: Priporočeno: 7.

trans-unit.source: The maximum file size of pictures that customers can upload to customize a product (in bytes).
trans-unit.target: Največja velikost slike, ki jo lahko naloži stranka za prilagoditev izdelka (v bajtih).

trans-unit.source: Width of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: Širina prilagojene slike izdelka, ki jo lahko kupec naloži (v pikslih).

trans-unit.source: Height of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: Višina prilagojene slike izdelka, ki jo lahko kupec naloži (v pikslih).

trans-unit.source: This will generate an additional file for each image (thus doubling your total amount of images). Resolution of these images will be twice higher.
trans-unit.target: To bo ustvarilo dodatno datoteko za vsako sliko (podvoji skupno število slik). Resolucija teh slik bo dvakrat večja.

trans-unit.source: Enable to optimize the display of your images on high pixel density screens.
trans-unit.target: Omogoči za optimizacijo prikaza slik na zaslonih z visoko ločljivostjo.

trans-unit.source: This should be set to yes unless you successfully moved images in "Images" page under the "Preferences" menu.
trans-unit.target: Ta postavka mora biti nastavljena na da, razen če ste uspešno premaknili slike na stran "Slike" v meniju "Možnosti".

trans-unit.source: Letters, underscores and hyphens only (e.g. "small_custom", "cart_medium", "large", "thickbox_extra-large").
trans-unit.target: Samo črke, podčrtaji in vezaji (e.g. "small_custom", "cart_medium", "large", "thickbox_extra-large").

trans-unit.source: Maximum image width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalna širina slike v pixlih.

trans-unit.source: Maximum image height in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalna višina slike v pixlih.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Product images.
trans-unit.target: Ta tip bo uporabljen za slike izdelkov.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Category images.
trans-unit.target: Ta vrsta bo uporabljena za slike kategorij.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Brand images.
trans-unit.target: Ta tip bo uporabljen za scenske slike.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Supplier images.
trans-unit.target: Ta tip bo uporabljen na slikah dobaviteljev.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Store images.
trans-unit.target: Ta tip bo dodan slikam trgovin.

trans-unit.source: Add new page category
trans-unit.target: Dodaj novo kategorijo strani

trans-unit.source: Add new page
trans-unit.target: Dodaj novo stran

trans-unit.source: E.g. address, addresses, attachment
trans-unit.target: Npr. naslov, naslovi, priponke

trans-unit.source: Please select a module
trans-unit.target: Prosim izberite modul

trans-unit.source: Select a module above before choosing from available hooks
trans-unit.target: Preden izbereš kavlje, ki so na voljo moraš prvo izbrati enega izmed zgornjih modulov

trans-unit.source: Please specify the files for which you do not want the module to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Določite tiste datoteke pri katerih nočete prikazati modula.

trans-unit.source: Please input each filename, separated by a comma (",").
trans-unit.target: Prosim vnesite vsako ime datoteke, ločeno z vejico (",").

trans-unit.source: You can also click the filename in the list below, and even make a multiple selection by keeping the Ctrl key pressed while clicking, or choose a whole range of filename by keeping the Shift key pressed while clicking.
trans-unit.target: Lahko pa tudi kliknete na ime datoteke iz spodnjega seznama, lahko jih tudi izberete več naenkrat, če držite CTRL ob klikanju, ali izberete vse, če pritisnete tipko Shift med klikanjem.

trans-unit.source: Regenerates thumbnails for all existing images
trans-unit.target: Ponovno ustvari sličice za vse obstoječe slike izdelkov

trans-unit.source: Please be patient. This can take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo za strpnost. To lahko traja nekaj minut.

trans-unit.source: Be careful! Manually uploaded thumbnails will be erased and replaced by automatically generated thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: Bodite pazljivi! Ročno prenešeni predogledi bodo izbrisani in zamenjani z avtomatsko generiranimi predogledi.

trans-unit.source: Select "No" only if your server timed out and you need to resume the regeneration.
trans-unit.target: Izberi "Ne" samo, če je vašemu strežniku potekel čas in morate ponovit regeneracijo.
